headline.main: SHIPPING--MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: A LONG, leisurely ocean trip down the east coast of South America makes a fine vacation for someone with  enough time at his disposal and the ability to have fun on a cruise without organized fiesta atmosphere or guided shore parties.
docs.lead_paragraph: A LONG, leisurely ocean trip down the east coast of South America makes a fine vacation for someone with enough time at his disposal and the ability to have fun on a cruise without organized fiesta atmosphere or guided shore parties.
docs.abstract: cruises from NYC to Brazil and Argentina aboard IFC Lines freighters described

headline.main: FREIGHTERS TO SOUTH AMERICA; Brazil-Argentina Sailings Are Basis for Informal Vacation Trips

docs.snippet: IN order to facilitate pleasure travel to Colombia, the Colombian Government has waived all passport and visa require  ments for bona fide tourists from the United States and Canada. Colombian consuls in those countries have been authorized to issue...
docs.lead_paragraph: IN order to facilitate pleasure travel to Colombia, the Colombian Government has waived all passport and visa require ments for bona fide tourists from the United States and Canada. Colombian consuls in those countries have been authorized to issue tourist cards on presentation of proof of citizenship.

docs.abstract: AMMI repts 1,956 ships sold for total of $1,714,703,274 under '46 Sales Act; US buyers take 843; GB largest foreign buyer; sales to 34 nations and purchase prices listed

headline.main: 1,956 SURPLUS SHIPS NET U.S. 1.7 BILLION; American Interests Acquire 843, Britain Second With 218 and Panama 3d With 152
